mapper.insert: insert into activity_seckill ( id, name, sku_id, max_buy_quantity, quantity, settlement_price, price, sort_order, description, show_time, begin_time, end_time, is_white_list_activity, verify_status, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime )values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{skuId}, #{maxBuyQuantity}, #{quantity}, #{settlementPrice}, #{price}, #{sortOrder}, #{description}, #{showTime}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{isWhiteListActivity}, #{verifyStatus}, #{creator}, #{ctime}, #{modifier}, #{mtime} )
mapper.update:
update activity_seckill
id=#{id},
name=#{name},
sku_id=#{skuId},
max_buy_quantity=#{maxBuyQuantity},
quantity=#{quantity},
settlement_price=#{settlementPrice},
price=#{price},
sort_order=#{sortOrder},
description=#{description},
show_time=#{showTime},
begin_time=#{beginTime},
end_time=#{endTime},
is_white_list_activity=#{isWhiteListActivity},
verify_status=#{verifyStatus},
creator=#{creator},
ctime=#{ctime},
modifier=#{modifier},
mtime=#{mtime},
id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, sku_id, max_buy_quantity, quantity, settlement_price, price, sort_order, description, show_time, begin_time, end_time, is_white_list_activity, verify_status, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from activity_seckill where id=#{id}

select id, name, sku_id, max_buy_quantity, quantity, settlement_price, price, sort_order, description, show_time, begin_time, end_time, is_white_list_activity, verify_status, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from activity_seckill where id=#{id}

select id, name, sku_id, max_buy_quantity, quantity, settlement_price, price, sort_order, description, show_time, begin_time, end_time, is_white_list_activity, verify_status, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime
limit #{offset},#{rows}
